content:
I'm happy to help! However, I'm a large language model, I don't have real-time access to current weather conditions or forecasts. But I can suggest a few options to help you find out the weather forecast for your area:

1. Check online weather websites: You can visit websites like AccuWeather, Weather.com, or the National Weather Service (NWS) website to get the latest weather forecast for your area.
2. Use a weather app: You can download a weather app on your smartphone, such as Dark Sky or Weather Underground, to get current weather conditions and forecasts.
3. Tune into local news: Watch local news or check their website to get the latest weather forecast for your area.
4. Check social media: Many meteorologists and weather stations have social media accounts where they post updates on weather conditions and forecasts.

Remember to check the forecast close to Saturday morning to get the most accurate information. Have a great jog!
